answers.answer: It could be something in the food you are eating.  Mine changes all the time depending on what I'm eating.  But if this is something you are still worried about ask your dr at your next appt or call a nurse.  But I'm pretty sure you are fine.

How far along are you?  Not wanting to scare you but Gestational Diabetes is a possibility.  If extreme thirst and urination doesn't slow down in a few weeks you should truly have them test for that.  They normally wouldn't test until the 4th month, but there's no written rule that says it cant start earlier.  To be on the safe side I would let your OB know asap, b/c it could be an iron deficiency as well.

thanx.....i'm not sure how far a long i am but no more then 8 weeks, probably closers to 6.  i have an ultra sound monday to find out for sure.....i was kinda worried about the diabetes thing too......i'll keep an eye on it and if it doesn't seem to change i'll mention it to my doc.  Someone told me that it could be this way from recently starting new vitamins...is this true?  i just started taking prenatals and calcium pills sunday
That is a very good possibility but you should take the precautions you need and ask you dr.  Good Luck with the u/s.

Throughout my whole pregnancy I have been thirsty ALL the time!!! Honestly my mouth gets so dry I feel like I'm in the Sahara desert of something! Also whenever I pee its like a dark yellowish color kinda looks murky if that could be the word for it. Completely normal pregnancy I don't have gestational diabetes or anything like that. Sounds like your fine to me but if your concerned then I would contact your doctor.

well thats good to know!  i want everything to be ok, this is strange because this will be my second child and i feel like its the first time all over again!  I figured the second time around i would be much more calm and relax and less worried.  But that is NOT the case, i guess its a mom thing LOL
Yeah I don't think pregnancy will ever not be scary even with your second. You can't really see whats going on in there so how can you NOT worry! :)

question: should i be worried that i am sooo thirsty all the time and I drink atleast 48oz of water a day.  Its actually a little higher then that normally drink about 64+ never less then 48oz.  My urine is still a dark yellow color even with all that water....what is wrong with me?
title: dark urine
